title: Standard Movement Animations by SVT
description: This is a library consisting of basic animation poses
longDescription: This is a library consisting of basic animation poses. It was created using our SVT system. It was very easy to create for us this is why we are giving it for low price. We really hope you enjoy it. Anyway, we are here to help - if in need for some additional animations just catch up with us. You can see example videos containing all animations in the following link: https://youtu.be/1oYnydUrUR4
technicalDetails:
Features: 

The provided set contains following animations:

* Crouch Walking

* Walking Blind

* Fighting Hit

* Walking Clown

* Running Forward

* Walking Confident

* Sitting To Standing

* Walking Cowboy

* Squatting To Standing

* Walking Creeper

* Standing Idle 1

* Walking Drunk

* Standing Idle 2

* Walking Forward

* Standing Jump

* Walking Frankenstein

* Standing Jump Forward

* Walking Hippi

* Standing To Sitting

* Walking Mummy

* Standing To Squatting

* Walking Old Man

* Walking Angry

* Walking On Vacation

* Walking Backward

* Walking Robot

* Walking Bad Posture

* Walking Runway Model

* Walking Ballerina

* Walking Scuba Diver 

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: No

Number of Animations: 30

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): Root Motion

Number of Characters: 1

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: 

In the following link you can see the animations preview: https://youtu.be/ijWhOesGlsU

Important/Additional Notes:
